creators.name: Shinji Ikari
creators.description: An overworked third level student, doing his best to keep his grades up. 'How can I live, laugh, love in these conditions....'.

creators.name: Asuka Soryu Langley
creators.description: A conceited but brilliant student, currently on work placement, giving input on design periodically. 'Everyone is going through the same stress in third level, baka Shinji!...'.

info.description: A third level institution, Where the app is currently being developed.
